name: Aeroplane (GMTK)
description:
Please Note:This is an unfinished game. their are a lot of bugs in this game. This game was made during a 48 hour(GMTK) game jam. I'm sorry if your experiencing any difficulties playing through the game. THIS IS MY FIRST GAME JAM!

Side note: the howling soundFX in level 01 was by:

Astounded

 Christopher J Astbury 

 Switzerland

Can you survive the aeroplane that is going through turbulence to the extent that it gets OUT OF CONTROL for 30 seconds, or can you survive 30 seconds of obstacles coming at you.
